amendment.description: Amendment requires the Administrator of the National Motor Carrier Administration to work with interested parties to develop standards regarding access to, and the relevant data to be recorded by, electronic control modules in commercial motor vehicles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to include the finding that the use of recording devices in commercial motor vehicles may prove useful to law enforcement officials investigating highway crashes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
